result.html: An féidir leat cuidiú liomCan you help me?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat cuidiú liomCan you help me?

result.eng: I help her from time to time.
result.ga: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.orig: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.html: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.

result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: Cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.ga: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídean
result.orig: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídean
result.html: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídeanWe help homeless people.
result.ponchtml: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídeanWe help homeless people.

result.html: Ní aon chabhair éThat's no help.
result.ponchtml: Ní aon ċaḃair éThat's no help.

result.ga: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.orig: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.html: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linnThey couldn't help us.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ siad in ann caḃrú linnThey couldn't help us.

result.eng: She wasn't willing to help me.
result.ga: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.orig: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.html: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sí toilteanaċ cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.

result.html: Thairg siad cabhair domThey offred me help.
result.ponchtml: Ṫairg siad caḃair domThey offred me help.

result.eng: I am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ga: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.orig: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.html: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má ḃíonn faḋbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.

result.eng: I can go with you if you need help.
result.ga: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.orig: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.html: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uaitI can go with you if you need help.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnaṁ uaitI can go with you if you need help.

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.

result.html: An dtugann sí cabhair dóDoes she help him?
